And finally comes the ultimate afternoon tea - Portuguese tarts which is not as hard as it seems to be.

programme.title: Peter Kuruvita's Mexican Fiesta E4
programme.desc: Peter gets to know the real Mexico as he travels on top of a 50 year old jeepney to the ghost town of Real de Catorce in search of peyote, before heading south to the romantic town of Guanajuato to learn how to make the most ubiquitous of all Mexican food, tortillas.

programme.title: Peter Kuruvita's Mexican Fiesta E5
programme.desc: Peter Kuruvita arrives in one of the largest metropolises on earth, Mexico City, discovering a city of extremes with high end dining sitting side by side with some of the cheapest and tastiest street food in the world.

programme.title: Peter Kuruvita's Mexican Fiesta E6 !
programme.desc: Contrary to popular opinion, mole is not just a chilli chocolate sauce, although mole poblano is the most well-known and this episode sees Peter Kuruvita learns the secrets to this incredibly complicated concoction.

programme.title: Don't Tell My Mother S3E9
programme.desc: Diego explores where past and present collide in the biggest city in the world, Tokyo. Japan is one of the most technologically-advanced places on the planet, and in the richest city in Asia, the line between reality and fiction seems thin. From the wild to the traditional, the classic to the outlandish, discover Tokyo like you've never seen it before.

programme.title: Korean Soul Food
programme.desc: With a sound reputation of being healthy, balanced and flavorsome, Korean food has drawn global attention and attracted people around the world to visit the bustling capital city, Seoul. In the company of actress Eun-Hye Park, we'll be revealing the taste and history of a variety of popular Korean dishes, including samgyetang and bibimbap, as well as investigating their healthy cooking principal.

programme.title: Fish Tank Kings S2E11
programme.desc: Upon arrival at Craig and Nancy Schupke's home for what he assumes is a run-of-the-mill tank renovation, Mat is stunned to find himself standing on top of one of the most unique aquariums he's ever encountered. Below him is a 25000 gallon saltwater lagoon that has fallen out of care, and what once resembled a vibrant reef is now a murky puddle with algae-caked corals and brown water.

programme.title: Wild 24 S3E1
programme.desc: It is a 24-hour journey through the kingdom of big cats, where cheetahs, leopards, jaguars and lions out-hunt and out-compete the rest of the animals to hold their place at the top of the food chain. Stealthiness, cunningness and power are the symbols of big cats. The felines are merciless in the battlefield because every hunt is a calculated kill for them.

programme.title: Frozen Islands E1
programme.desc: In the Southern Atlantic and Indian Oceans, between the latitudes of 40 and 60 degrees South, there is a scattering of tiny, inhospitable islands that are crucial to the survival of millions of marine creatures that use these islands to breed. South Georgia, Bouvet, Marion and Crozet Islands are home to some of the world's largest populations of Elephant Seals, Antarctic Fur Seals, Wandering Albatross, King and Macaroni Penguins. These creatures, superbly adapted to life in a freezing ocean need to come ashore to mate and raise their young. And where there are millions of animals there are the hunters that follow: Killer Whales.

programme.title: Snakes In The City S6E3 !
programme.sub-title: There's A Snake In The Fridge
programme.desc: Snakes in the City is a documentary-style reality TV series centering on the daily life of snake rescuers, Simon Keys, and his herpetologist girlfriend, Siouxsie Gillett in the coastal city of Durban, South Africa. This once was a tropical jungle teaming with spitting cobras, green mambas, black mambas, pythons, night adders, bush snakes and boomslangs: it's their territory and humans built a city right on top of it. Today, the jungle may be gone, but the snakes sure ain't! Summer is here and the heat and humidity bring them out of hiding, into direct conflict with the 3.5 million inhabitants of this city. There is a snake in nearly ever home so Simon and Siouxsie, experts in animal behavior, hunt down and capture by hand, the world's most dangerous and venomous snakes that emerge every summer. They then release these problem snakes back in the wild away from humans. Every call out is a chance to save a snake's life and with this being his busiest time of year, they're on cal.

programme.title: Fish Tank Kings S2E11
programme.desc: Upon arrival at Craig and Nancy Schupke's home for what he assumes is a run-of-the-mill tank renovation, Mat is stunned to find himself standing on top of one of the most unique aquariums he's ever encountered. Below him is a 25000 gallon saltwater lagoon that has fallen out of care, and what once resembled a vibrant reef is now a murky puddle with algae-caked corals and brown water.

These creatures, superbly adapted to life in a freezing ocean need to come ashore to mate and raise their young. And where there are millions of animals there are the hunters that follow: Killer Whales.

programme.title: Snakes In The City S6E3 !
programme.sub-title: There's A Snake In The Fridge
programme.desc: Snakes in the City is a documentary-style reality TV series centering on the daily life of snake rescuers, Simon Keys, and his herpetologist girlfriend, Siouxsie Gillett in the coastal city of Durban, South Africa. This once was a tropical jungle teaming with spitting cobras, green mambas, black mambas, pythons, night adders, bush snakes and boomslangs: it's their territory and humans built a city right on top of it. Today, the jungle may be gone, but the snakes sure ain't! Summer is here and the heat and humidity bring them out of hiding, into direct conflict with the 3.5 million inhabitants of this city. There is a snake in nearly ever home so Simon and Siouxsie, experts in animal behavior, hunt down and capture by hand, the world's most dangerous and venomous snakes that emerge every summer. They then release these problem snakes back in the wild away from humans. Every call out is a chance to save a snake's life and with this being his busiest time of year, they're on cal.

programme.title: Snakes In The City S6E4
programme.desc: Simon and Sioux nearly get bitten catching and releasing mating Boomslangs. Teamwork is everything, but sometimes they split up to help all the snakes.

programme.title: The Naked Superhero
programme.desc: Looks aren't everything. Despite its appearance, the Naked Molerat should be envied. It lives to a very old age, never gets sick, and is practically impervious to pain. Scientists want to know why. In the quest to combat age-related illness - and even ageing itself - researchers around the world are searching for the Methuselah gene in this remarkable rodent to find cures for humans.

programme.title: Shark Men S2E5
programme.desc: The lengths to which the Expedition team will go to for science is astonishing. They face hazards such as injury, harsh weather conditions, leaking or, in the worst case, sinking boats and have to endure all this in the home of some of the most ferocious marine predators in the world. All of this for an ever elusive giant female Great White Shark.

programme.title: Wild 24 S3E6
programme.desc: A battle for survival takes place on the ancient isles of the East Indies, a land where dragons still roam, big apes hold sway over jungles and the rarest big cats hunt. Battles are won and lost while life comes and goes every single day in this evolutionary melting pot.

programme.title: Frozen Islands E2
programme.desc: The islands found in the Southern Indian and Pacific Oceans are so remote that man hardly ever sets foot on them. They're some of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but they are crucial to the survival of some of the world's rarest creatures. Southern Right Whales breed in the bay of Auckland and Enderby, New Zealand Seal Lions and Yellow-eyed penguins use the beaches and forests. Royal Penguins nest only on the island of Macquarie and the Royal Albatross uses the slopes of Campbell Island. And where there are breeders there are hunters: Killer Whales and Giant Petrels.

programme.title: Snakes In The City S6E5
programme.desc: Sioux comes face-to-face with a Green mamba, Simon is almost bitten by a Black mamba and they catch two bizarre snakes that don't belong in Durban!

programme.title: Snakes In The City S6E6
programme.desc: A huge black mamba hides under the kitchen sink, Simon rips apart a couch to find a spitter and climbs a tree to catch a highly-venomous vine snake.

programme.title: The Miracle Cheetah
programme.desc: Born a wild cheetah in South Africa's North West province, Sibella's life nearly ended at the hands of hunters. Lying at death's door, fear and mistrust haunting her eyes, she was fortunate enough to be rescued by the De Wildt Cheetah and Wildlife Trust. In December 2003, Sibella began a new chapter when she was flown to Samara along with two male cheetah. Eleven years on, Sibella has outlived most cheetah in the wild, proving herself to be a capable hunter despite the occasional twinge from her previous injuries.

programme.title: Wild 24 S3E6
programme.desc: A battle for survival takes place on the ancient isles of the East Indies, a land where dragons still roam, big apes hold sway over jungles and the rarest big cats hunt. Battles are won and lost while life comes and goes every single day in this evolutionary melting pot.

programme.title: Frozen Islands E2
programme.desc: The islands found in the Southern Indian and Pacific Oceans are so remote that man hardly ever sets foot on them. They're some of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but they are crucial to the survival of some of the world's rarest creatures. Southern Right Whales breed in the bay of Auckland and Enderby, New Zealand Seal Lions and Yellow-eyed penguins use the beaches and forests. Royal Penguins nest only on the island of Macquarie and the Royal Albatross uses the slopes of Campbell Island. And where there are breeders there are hunters: Killer Whales and Giant Petrels.

programme.title: Snakes In The City S6E5
programme.desc: Sioux comes face-to-face with a Green mamba, Simon is almost bitten by a Black mamba and they catch two bizarre snakes that don't belong in Durban!

programme.title: Snakes In The City S6E6
programme.desc: A huge black mamba hides under the kitchen sink, Simon rips apart a couch to find a spitter and climbs a tree to catch a highly-venomous vine snake.

programme.title: The Miracle Cheetah
programme.desc: Born a wild cheetah in South Africa's North West province, Sibella's life nearly ended at the hands of hunters. Lying at death's door, fear and mistrust haunting her eyes, she was fortunate enough to be rescued by the De Wildt Cheetah and Wildlife Trust. In December 2003, Sibella began a new chapter when she was flown to Samara along with two male cheetah. Eleven years on, Sibella has outlived most cheetah in the wild, proving herself to be a capable hunter despite the occasional twinge from her previous injuries.

programme.title: Shark Men S2E5
programme.desc: The lengths to which the Expedition team will go to for science is astonishing. They face hazards such as injury, harsh weather conditions, leaking or, in the worst case, sinking boats and have to endure all this in the home of some of the most ferocious marine predators in the world. All of this for an ever elusive giant female Great White Shark.

programme.title: Wild 24 S3E6
programme.desc: A battle for survival takes place on the ancient isles of the East Indies, a land where dragons still roam, big apes hold sway over jungles and the rarest big cats hunt. Battles are won and lost while life comes and goes every single day in this evolutionary melting pot.

programme.title: Frozen Islands E2
programme.desc: The islands found in the Southern Indian and Pacific Oceans are so remote that man hardly ever sets foot on them. They're some of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but they are crucial to the survival of some of the world's rarest creatures. Southern Right Whales breed in the bay of Auckland and Enderby, New Zealand Seal Lions and Yellow-eyed penguins use the beaches and forests. Royal Penguins nest only on the island of Macquarie and the Royal Albatross uses the slopes of Campbell Island. And where there are breeders there are hunters: Killer Whales and Giant Petrels.

programme.title: Fish Tank Kings S2E12
programme.desc: Mat Roy and his chief creative force Jose Blanco head across the country where a special celebrity client has a dream that he wants to make reality. Cesar Milan is building an elaborate retreat for dogs and their owners, aiming for a spa-like experience. He wants a koi fish pond as the meditative centerpiece of his desert oasis. Unquestionably one of Living Color's the most unique jobs.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines E2
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. On Bohol we explore the Chocolate hills and met the man who has done more than anyone else to help the Philippine tarsier, a tiny, bug-eyed primate. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra. On Cebu we join the crowds that come to swim with whale sharks, explore the island home of the sea krait and thrill to see a pelagic thresher shark. On Mindanao we visit a family that have been caring for the endemic Philippine sailfin lizards for many years, so long in fact, that they get 160 or more turning up for breakfast. On Samal island we see the world's greatest concentration of Geoffroys Rousette fruit bats and learn of their value to local farmers. In the South of Mindanao we end with the most iconic Philippine animal of all, the majestic Philipp.

programme.title: Kingdom Of The White Wolf E3
programme.desc: Meet the Polygon Pack, a family of arctic wolves surviving and raising young in amidst the polygon ponds of the high arctic.

programme.title: Monster Constrictors
programme.desc: They are the big, the bold and arguably the most majestic of the snake world? super sleuths, silent yet deadly predators, that squeeze the life out of their victims. Pythons are nature's Monster Constrictors. Rather than pack the potent punch of a venom payload, constrictors use stealth and muscle power alone to subdue and extinguish their unwary prey. While some target the small and weak, others take on David and Goliath battles for the sake of a decent feed? Don't be fooled by their docile appearance - or the fact that they lack lethal fangs - these insidious killers are just as deadly as their notoriously venomous brethren. Their weapon of choice; constriction. Comparatively subtle, but no less effective. Yet some also have a tender side, with most python mothers shivering to generate warmth for their egg clutches, sheltering precious eggs in their protective coils. In Africa, they reach mega magnitudes and levels of aggression. In Florida, they have thrived to plague prop.

programme.title: Monster Fish S4E3
programme.desc: Growing up to six feet long and weighing more than 175 pounds, the deadly wallago catfish is a pure carnivore equipped with formidable jaws and a double band of saw-like teeth that are designed to attack. Seeking help from local fishermen, Zeb Hogan travels to the jungles of Malaysia, where wallago are rumored to swallow monkeys, porcupines and even monitor lizards.

programme.title: Hooked S5E3
programme.desc: Marauding mobs of Humboldt squid have spread northward from their native range, invading new territory in the northern Pacific. Fishermen and scientists alike are concerned about what these hordes of opportunistic feeders might be eating. We travel to the Sea of Cortez to perform groundbreaking tests and observations. Can explorers unlock the secrets of a predator on the move?

programme.title: Animal Fight Club S5E4
programme.desc: This killer episode of Animal Fight Club reveals how some of the most dangerous fights in the animal kingdom are between the same species, whether for territory, bloodline or survival. It also shows the amazing escape techniques fighters use to escape death. Top wildlife film makers and user generated footage from around the world prove that from top predators to the smallest insects, life is a constant battle - and there can only be one winner.

programme.title: Monster Constrictors
programme.desc: They are the big, the bold and arguably the most majestic of the snake world? super sleuths, silent yet deadly predators, that squeeze the life out of their victims. Pythons are nature's Monster Constrictors. Rather than pack the potent punch of a venom payload, constrictors use stealth and muscle power alone to subdue and extinguish their unwary prey. Yet some also have a tender side, with most python mothers shivering to generate warmth for their egg clutches, sheltering precious eggs in their protective coils. In Africa, they reach mega magnitudes and levels of aggression. In Florida, they have thrived to plague prop.

programme.title: World's Weirdest S1E3
programme.desc: Get ready to brush feathers with the freakiest birds in the world as we take to the sky. Check out dancing manakins that do the moonwalk, shrikes impaling their prey before ripping it apart, and lyrebirds singing snazzy solos. Some of the freaks don't even need wings for takeoff - flying squirrels, flying snakes, and carps springing from the water to knock people out, will blow your mind.

programme.title: Unlikely Animal Friends S4E4
programme.desc: Here comes another 3 pairs of special friends you've never seen before: a wild fawn who is friends with a dog, an autistic four-year-old child who comes out of his shell with the help of his feathered friends (a flock of chickens), and a cat that's friends with a rat.

programme.title: Shark Men S2E6
programme.desc: The Expedition team came to Guadalupe Island to tag sharks and now their wishes will be fulfilled. The team catches a series of monstrous fish, some are more challenging than others and provide new challenges. The key to finding out more about Great Whites is to find out where and how they are breeding but so far no one has been able to pinpoint a breeding ground.

programme.title: Kingdom Of The White Wolf E2
programme.desc: As Winter approaches, the pack is running out of food and needs a fresh kill. White Scarf leads the pack in a successful hunt of a muskox calf, and ensures that the pups eat first. As the pack sleeps with full bellies, White Scarf limps away and doesn't return.

programme.title: Wild Cambodia
programme.desc: We take you to wild Cambodia, where the extreme monsoon weather systems have created one of the most unique ecosystems on the planet. This ancient land was once ruled by a great empire, yet life here is dictated by an unforgiving weather system, from a life-sucking dry season to wet season defined by floods, shaping an incredibly diverse wildlife that you should not miss.

programme.title: America's Super-Snake
programme.desc: Rattlesnakes are the most highly evolved vipers on the planet. Their lighting strike and potent venom is legendary, and the mere sound of their signature rattle strikes fear into all who hear it. But beneath the deadly reputation, is a shy and sensuous snake, just trying to pass on its legacy. This is the story of a female Western diamondback, facing the challenges of a desert summer, where every creature needs backbone and cunning to survive.

programme.title: Dr Oakley: Yukon Vet S6E7
programme.desc: While Dr. Oakley awaits a litter of puppies, she hits the road to treat a stubborn bison, and a moose with a respiratory issue. In the clinic, she checks a Great Dane's swollen leg.

programme.title: Unlikely Animal Friends S4E3
programme.desc: In this episode, expect to see how a boy named Jeremy befriends his family cat called Tara, who saved him from a deadly canine attack. Also, a mother dog named Piper formed a maternal bond with her 'goat puppy' called GP, and a man loves to spoil the family's pet deer called Dillie.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Zoo S1E1
programme.desc: The zoo doctors go into hero mode, rescuing 16 macaws from a hoarding situation in Alabama, taking cheetah Emmet into a shoulder surgery that has never been attempted on his species before. At the Wilds conservation park, the doctors perform pregnancy tests on rare mares, while trying to find the medical cause of why a horse separated from the herd. Twin polar bear cubs, Niva and Nuniq, test their swimming skills in the shallow pool, before taking a leap of faith off the deep end and flamingo, Haleakala, shows love and appreciation for her keepers treating her stiff legs.

programme.title: Climbing Redwood Giants: Life In The Sky
programme.desc: Climbing Redwood Giants- Life in the Sky tells the story of the worlds tallest living trees. Humboldt State Universitys Steve Sillett, the first researcher to explore the redwood canopy, is obsessed with monster redwoods. As Sillett investigates redwoods up in their towering crowns, National Geographic Photographer Jim Balog photographs every inch of these fascinating trees.

programme.title: Monster Fish S4E1
programme.desc: Giant carp can grow up to weigh 600 pounds and measure ten feet long, but the trouble with finding these behemoths is they only live in three of Southeast Asia's rivers. To find out more about them, Zeb heads to Thailand where he helps the Thai Department of Fisheries transport 30 giant carp into a new breeding pond on the Chao Phraya River, and catches a giant goldfish of the size of a cow.

programme.title: Fishing For Giants E3
programme.desc: Extreme angler Andy Coetzee, has travelled the world in search of the largest, wiliest and most elusive fish on the planet, but a few big fish still elude him - the Guinean Giant Barracuda is one of them. Andy's epic quest plunges him into deepest, darkest Africa to find the scariest and most dangerous fish of them all. A fish that's worthy of horror movies. Catching one is exhillarating... but landing it can be life-threatening. A whirlwind of teeth and hooks in a confined space, they don't go down without a brutal struggle.

programme.title: Snakes In The City S6E5
programme.desc: Sioux comes face-to-face with a Green mamba, Simon is almost bitten by a Black mamba and they catch two bizarre snakes that don't belong in Durban!

programme.title: Snakes In The City S6E6
programme.desc: A huge black mamba hides under the kitchen sink, Simon rips apart a couch to find a spitter and climbs a tree to catch a highly-venomous vine snake.

programme.title: Dr Oakley: Yukon Vet S6E8
programme.desc: Dr. Oakley participates in a race pitting human runners against reindeer, five muskox undergo pregnancy tests, and Daisy participates in a family reunion.

programme.title: Hostile Planet E3
programme.desc: Step inside the most frigid habitat known to Earth - the poles. Here, the planet's ultimate survivalists include whale-hunting polar bears, leopard-seal dodging penguins and a pack of Arctic wolves that bring down a pair of musk oxen. Polar species have evolved bodies and behaviours that help them combat the intense hostility of their habitats. But now, their world is changing so fast - literally breaking apart under their feet - and their resilience will be tested beyond the extreme.

programme.title: Tree Climbing Lions
programme.desc: Big cat biologist Alexander Braczkowski is on a mission. He's got 90 days to count lions in Uganda and learn how the population is doing. But these aren't ordinary lions. The prides in Queen Elizabeth National Park spend most of their lives up in the trees, a rare and mysterious behavior unique to this part of Africa. On his journey, he'll witness mothers battling the odds to raise cubs through their first year of life, and the threats tree climbing lions face as the human population expands. Alex's experience will become more personal than he could have imagined, and he'll learn that saving lions can be about much more than counting cats.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom S3E4
programme.desc: Mmamotse's rule has turned the Kingdom upside down. Her army run rampant, but her legacy now depends on a Princess stepping up to the throne. As the flood waters retreat, Dikeledi readies her cubs for escape, but must risk crossing enemy territory. And a run in with the Matahta Pride brings things into focus for Pula, as she begins training her young assassin. In the Savage Kingdom, the young hold the key to power - the future is theirs for the taking.

programme.title: Hooked S5E3
programme.desc: Marauding mobs of Humboldt squid have spread northward from their native range, invading new territory in the northern Pacific. programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S13E20
programme.desc: Dr. Huang (BD Wong) reunites with the SVU squad to track down a twisted seducer of young women.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S13E21
programme.desc: A string of hate crimes hits close to home for Detective Tutuola (Ice-T), and the SVU squad suspects a cover-up when a private school teacher (guest star Tony Hale) is similarly attacked.

programme.title: Macgyver S4E1
programme.desc: Ex-MI6 agent Russ Taylor recruits former Phoenix Foundation members Mac, Riley, Bozer, Matty and Desi to hunt down a bioweapon that's planned to be used by a mysterious organization for a devastating attack on a major U.S. city.

programme.title: The Blacklist S7E11
programme.desc: Red tracks a gifted art forger who has thwarted his plans to sell stolen pieces. Aram's love life becomes increasingly complicated. Liz and Ressler confide in each other.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior S8E7
programme.desc: American Ninja Warrior comes back for an eighth season. Matt Iseman returns as host, along with co-hosts Akbar Gbaja Biamila and Kristine Leahy.

programme.title: Rude(Ish) Tube E59
programme.desc: Rude(ish) Tube is a hilarious half hour show featuring the funniest, freakiest and most incredible clips that have ever been uploaded to the World Wide Web featuring pranks, animals and cute kids.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S13E22
programme.desc: A missing woman leads Rollins (Kelli Giddish) and the SVU detectives into the underground world of self-mutilation and fetishism.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S13E23
programme.desc: A high society bachelor party ends in tragedy when an escort is found dead, and the SVU Squad must proceed with caution as influential people try to bury the truth.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior S8E9
programme.desc: American Ninja Warrior comes back for an eighth season. Matt Iseman returns as host, along with co-hosts Akbar Gbaja Biamila and Kristine Leahy.

programme.title: Blue Bloods S8E5
programme.desc: Season 8 premieres in a shocking twist, it was revealed that Danny Reagan's wife, ER nurse Linda (Amy Carlson), has passed on, having perished on May 28 in a helicopter crash.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles S9E5
programme.desc: Sam goes undercover as a day trader after a prominent investment banker with ties to a Russian oligarch is murdered.

programme.title: The Blacklist S7E11
programme.desc: Red tracks a gifted art forger who has thwarted his plans to sell stolen pieces. Aram's love life becomes increasingly complicated. Liz and Ressler confide in each other.

programme.title: Songland S1E6
programme.sub-title: Aloe Blacc/Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Undiscovered songwriters pitch original material to Aloe Blacc and director David Leitch, who are looking for material for the film 'Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw'; one song is chosen to be recorded by Blacc and featured in the film.

programme.title: Paranormal Witness S4E9
programme.desc: When Linda Coddington moved into the apartment in Washington Missouri with her little daughter, she thought she'd found a sanctuary for her family. But something evil was lurking behind the boarded up fireplace - the familiar of a witch who'd lived there years before...

programme.title: Paranormal Witness S4E10
programme.desc: Terrorized by malevolent forces, Carolyn and Roger Perron and their five daughters endured physical attacks, ghostly sightings and a life-threatening curse, culminating in the near death of Carolyn, as witnessed by famed paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren...

programme.title: Bulletproof S1E4
programme.desc: Pike and Tanner are summoned to Pike Snr's office to be publicly berated for disobeying orders. Pike makes assurances that he and Bishop are absolutely NOT still investigating the Sharp case.

programme.title: Anacondas: Trail Of Blood
programme.desc: When an experiment on a baby snake goes terribly wrong, the genetically enhanced reptile grows monstrous in size and appetite, leaving a trail of panic and destruction in its wake.

programme.title: Triassic Attack
programme.desc: In this action-packed made for television thriller, dinosaur fossils are re-animated by an angry Native American man who is heartbroken that his ancestor's sacred land is being developed. He puts a curse on the town and the local university, and the bones come to life attacking everything in their paths. The local Sheriff and his family must figure out how to reverse the curse before more people become dino-food.

programme.title: America's Got Talent S14E3
programme.desc: Auditions continue as variety acts of all types and contestants of all ages audition for the chance to win the $1 million prize, three more lucky acts have the chance to go directly to the Live Shows.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: The adventures of a heroic and debonair stalwart mouse named Stuart Little with human qualities, who faces some comic misadventures while searching for his lost bird friend and living with a human family as their child.

programme.title: Macgyver S4E1
programme.desc: Ex-MI6 agent Russ Taylor recruits former Phoenix Foundation members Mac, Riley, Bozer, Matty and Desi to hunt down a bioweapon that's planned to be used by a mysterious organization for a devastating attack on a major U.S. city.

programme.title: Seal Team S3E12
programme.desc: SEAL Team follows the professional and personal lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions that our country can ask of them.

programme.desc: Henry teams up with a Marine veteran to fight for legislation that helps Veterans Affairs provide better mental health care, but he encounters surprising resistance from Vice President Carlos Morejon (Jose Zuniga). programme.sub-title: Ukuli'i Ka Pua, Onaona I Ka Mau'u (Tiny Is The Flower, Yet It Scents The Gr
programme.desc: Five-0 enlists imprisoned hacker Aaron Wright to help when a young girl is reported kidnapped, but upon rescue, the culprits are dead, the girl is safe, and she's not who she claims to be.

programme.title: Seal Team S3E12
programme.desc: Amid several life-altering moments on the home front, Bravo Team travels overseas to extract a CIA agent who is being held hostage. The Tactical Operations Center is compromised.

programme.title: Men In Black

programme.desc: Ethan gets a tour of the facility and personnel that manage the day-to-day operations of Wayward Pines and learns more about the history and how the residents ended up in the eerie town. Meanwhile, at the realty office, Theresa finds a map of an unusual plot of land she wants to investigate, and Kate and Harold are planning a covert operation.

programme.title: Wayward Pines S1E7
programme.desc: After discovering the truth behind Wayward Pines, Ethan finds a bomb planted in his car, which makes him question people whom he thought he could trust. Meanwhile, Kate and Harold have a fertility consultation meeting with Nurse Pam, and Ben and Amy's relationship heats up.

programme.title: Wayward Pines S1E8
programme.desc: After an explosion on Main Street leaves two key residents of Wayward Pines in critical condition, Ethan is determined to find out who is responsible for the horrific act. Meanwhile, Harold opts out of the covert operation he and Kate were planning, and Nurse Pam interviews surveillance engineers to find out if there are any workers responsible for falsely reporting activities of any Wayward Pines residents.

programme.title: Wayward Pines S1E9
programme.desc: After Harold attempts to break past the fence surrounding Wayward Pines, Ethan interrogates him about other insurgents who have gone off the grid. Meanwhile, Amy's health takes a turn for the worse; Nurse Pam encourages Theresa to investigate Plot 33; Ben's teacher, Megan Fisher, advises Ben to speak publicly about the current events effecting Wayward Pines; and Ethan reveals the truth about the town to the residents.

programme.title: Wayward Pines S1E10
programme.desc: After Pilcher decides to turn off the electricity in Wayward Pines – with deadly repercussions – Ethan and Kate take the initiative to make sure everyone is out of harm's way. Meanwhile, Nurse Pam confronts Pilcher about his decision and tries to convince him to reconsider, Ethan and Kate plan for an attack, and the first generation tries to protect the future of Wayward Pines by taking matters into their own hands.

programme.title: Tell Me A Story S1E6
programme.desc: Kayla spends a day in the city with Nick, gaining a new perspective on not only their relationship but her future. Eddie nears a breaking point due to Jordan's relentless torment but Mitch offers Eddie a solution.

programme.title: Tell Me A Story S1E7
programme.desc: After a devastating betrayal, Hannah and Gabe find themselves lost in the woods and on the run from deadly assailants. Jordan's hunt for vengeance continues as he sets his sights on a new target.

programme.title: Tell Me A Story S1E8

programme.title: Tell Me A Story S1E9
programme.desc: Hannah takes on Katrina's henchmen in her attempt to get Gabe to safety. Nick refuses to take no for an answer, seeing anyone in Kayla's life as a potential threat to their future happiness.

programme.title: Tell Me A Story S1E10
programme.desc: Season finale. Hannah takes the fight to Katrina, culminating in a final showdown as she tries to free Gabe. Afraid of what an unhinged Josh is capable of, Kayla breaks off from Tim and the police to try and save Colleen.

programme.title: DOM
programme.desc: The Shamanovs are at their large house in the middle of the steppes for a family meeting when long-lost elder brother Victor appears after a 25-year absence. Family secrets surface, but no one knows that Victor is really escaping his dark past and killers.

programme.title: El Cinco
programme.desc: When a Captain of a C division Argentinian football team is expelled, he has to grapple with the fact that, at his age, there is no hope of reviving his football career. Having played for years with neither fame nor fortune, he has to rebuild his life.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: Anna, a journalist investigating a sex trafficking ring in Asia, meets Sam, a fixer. Her work takes a dark turn when she becomes a victim. Raped and tortured, she awakes in Montreal scarred and ready for revenge only to discover Sam's role in it all.

programme.title: Chocolate Kisses
programme.desc: Starring Luca Argentero (Eat Pray Love), this romantic adventure is about a chocolatier and his womanising assistant who find their relationship strained when the young man falls for his boss' lovely daughter. Can a little chocolate help?

programme.title: The Daddy Offensive
programme.desc: Markus, who has always wanted a family, is overjoyed when his holiday fling Lena becomes pregnant. Her father strongly disapproves of him and when the former turns up for his birthday, a hilarious showdown ensues between Markus and his future father-in-law.

programme.title: Modern Murder: Eye For An Eye
programme.desc: Detective duo Gorniak and Sieland are investigating the grisly murder of a manager of an insurance firm. They dive headfirst into a brutal and bloodthirsty insurance world where profit matters above all else.

programme.title: ROA
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film is a portrait of a naive idealist who winds up accused of murdering Jorge Eliecer Gaitan, a dissident candidate for Colombia's Liberal Party in 1950. The murder resulted in a decade of violence in the country.

programme.title: The Watchers: Beginning
programme.desc: The first of a four-part action adventure, four teens fight the rich for justice. Kira's friend is hit by a car driven by corrupt oligarch, Polyanski. She needs an operation urgently, but he refuses to pay the bill. Kira enlists her three friends to help.

programme.title: Blind Spot
programme.desc: Photographer Stephanie and her boyfriend Eric spend winter in the Caribbean where a serial killer is on the loose. When Stephanie snaps shots of an altercation between a truck driver and a young woman, the couple unwittingly become targets of a madman.

programme.title: Chucks
programme.desc: A tender coming-of-age story, punk-lover Mae takes to the streets after her brother dies, wearing his old Converse shoes, living off beer and painting graffiti. When she is sentenced to do social work, she meets and falls for Paul who is dying of AIDS.

programme.title: The Trace: Adrenalin
programme.desc: Dr Joe suspects his new patient has murdered a young nurse and she may not be his last victim. He risks career and family to confide in Detective Ruiz. Then, the body of a prostitute is found and evidence leads straight to Dr Joe. Who's the serial killer?

programme.title: Holiday Joy

programme.title: Bewitched
programme.desc: Struggling actor Jack Wyatt (Farrell) sets his sights on playing Darrin, the mere-mortal leading man in a feature film update to the successful 60's television series, Bewitched. The film could re-launch Jack's career, however it is missing one crucial element: the perfect Samantha. When Jack meets Isabel (Kidman), a good-natured woman desperately trying to live a normal life, he becomes infatuated with her, convinced she should be his leading lady in more ways than one. What Jack does not realize is that Isabel really is a witch and that their chance encounter is about to send both of their worlds into a tailspin.

programme.desc: Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.

programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: In the heartwarming film Big Fish, director Tim Burton brings his inimitable imagination on a journey that delves deep into a fabled relationship between a father and his son. ^^Edward Bloom (Finney) has always been a teller of tall tales about his oversized life as a young man (McGregor), when his wanderlust led him on an unlikely journey from a small town in Alabama, around the world, and back again. His mythic exploits dart from the delightful to the delirious as he weaves epic tales about giants, blizzards, a witch, and conjoined-twin lounge singers. With his larger-than-life stories, Bloom charms almost everyone he encounters except for his estranged son Will (Cruddup). When his mother Sandra (Lange) tries to reunite them, Will must learn how to separate fact from fiction as he comes to terms with his father's great feats and great fallings.

programme.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
programme.desc: Bohemian Rhapsody is an enthralling celebration of Queen, their music, and their extraordinary lead singer Freddie Mercury, who defied stereotypes and convention to become one of history's most beloved entertainers. Following Queen's meteoric rise, their revolutionary sound and Freddie's solo career, the film also chronicles the band's reunion, and one of the greatest performances in rock history.

programme.title: Prince Of Persia: The Sands Of Time
programme.desc: In this epic action-adventure set in the mystical lands of Persia, a rogue prince (Gyllenhaal) reluctantly joins forces with a mysterious princess (Arterton). Together, they race against dark forces to safeguard an ancient dagger capable of releasing the Sands of Time - a gift from the gods that can reverse time and allow its possessor to rule the world.

programme.title: Passengers (2016)
programme.desc: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Assigned to protect the five out-of-control children of an assassinated scientist working on vital government secrets, Shane is suddenly faced with juggling two incompatible jobs: fighting the bad guys and keeping house. While drop zones, demolitions and destroying enemy targets come naturally to Shane, he has no idea what tough really is until he pits his courage against diapering, den-mothering and driver's education.

programme.title: Rise Of The Guardians
programme.desc: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

Love, Lies
programme.desc: Seorang wanita penghibur diliputi kecemburuan setelah temannya sukses menjadi penyanyi pop dan kekasihnya jatuh hati padanya. Merasa dikhianati, ia mencoba mendapatkan kembali hal-hal yang hilang darinya.

programme.title: The Mayor
programme.desc: Byeon Jong-gu, walikota Seoul, mencalonkan diri sebagai presiden. Ia menggunakan segala cara untuk menyembunyikan rahasia-rahasia tergelapnya dari publik yang menyukainya.

programme.title: The Classified File
programme.desc: Seorang detektif veteran dan sesosok peramal menjalin kerja sama yang tidak biasa untuk menyelamatkan seorang anak yang diculik sebelum terlambat.

programme.title: Coffee Mate
programme.desc: Seorang ibu rumah tangga bertemu dengan seorang tukang kayu di sebuah kafe. Mereka menjadi 'rekan minum kopi' tanpa niat apapun hanya sekedar bertemu di kafe. Kemudian, mereka saling jatuh cinta.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: Seorang pangeran yang melarikan diri bertemu dengan seorang budak yang sangat mirip dengan dirinya. Sang pangeran disangka sebagai budak dan si budak dinobatkan sebagai Raja.

programme.title: The Spy: Undercover Operation
programme.desc: Seorang agen yang sedang menyamar di luar negeri berusaha untuk menyeimbangkan pekerjaannya yang rumit dan istrinya yang tak tahu pekerjaannya.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: Dua kakak beradik yang terpisah sejak lahir bersatu kembali 30 tahun kemudian dan melakukan perjalanan untuk mencari ibu mereka yang menderita Alzheimer.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: Seorang dokter menyaksikan kecelakaan mobil yang melibatkan putrinya, dan pada hari yang sama secara berulang-ulang. Ia pun berjuang untuk keluar dari putaran waktu dan menyelamatkan putrinya.

programme.title: I Can Speak
programme.desc: Seorang nenek menjalin sebuah persahabatan nan unik dengan seorang pegawai negeri sipil. Untuk suatu alasan, ia meminta untuk diajari bahasa Inggris oleh PNS tersebut saat mengetahui bahwa ia mahir akan hal itu.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Seorang penagih utang menderita kanker hati dan harus mendapatkan transplantasi hati dalam sepuluh hari. Seorang penipu bersedia mendonorkan hatinya jika ia bisa melacak pria yang memasukkannya ke dalam penjara.

programme.title: Blood And Ties
programme.desc: Seorang jurnalis mencurigai ayahnya adalah seorang penculik kejam yang melarikan diri 15 tahun yang lalu.

programme.title: Bleak Night
programme.desc: Seorang ayah mencoba menerima kenyataan bahwa putranya tewas karena bunuh diri. Penemuan sebuah foto menuntunnya untuk menyelidiki teman-teman putranya demi mengetahui apa yang sebenarnya terjadi.

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: Saat seorang bintang film menyewa sesosok gangster untuk menjadi lawan mainnya demi menghindari skandal setelah menghajar aktor lainnya hingga nyaris tewas, ia tak menyangka akan menghadapi sosok nan mematikan.

programme.title: Dark Figure Of Crime
programme.desc: Terinspirasi dari kisah nyata, film ini menceritakan tentang sebuah pertarungan psikologis nan sengit antara seorang detektif polisi dan seorang pembunuh yang mengaku telah melakukan beberapa pembunuhan.

programme.title: Love Guide For Dumpees
programme.desc: Dua orang yang baru saja dicampakkan menghabiskan malam dengan mabuk bersama untuk melupakan mantan mereka, lalu sepakat untuk bertemu sembilan kali lagi sebelum berjanji untuk tidak bertemu lagi.

programme.title: Mal-Mo-E: The Secret Mission
programme.desc: Selama pendudukan Jepang di tahun 1940-an, dua pria bekerjasama secara diam-diam membuat kamus bahasa Korea ketika bahasa tersebut dilarang.

programme.title: Hit-And-Run Squad
programme.desc: Seorang detektif polisi veteran dan seorang polisi muda bekerjasama untuk menangkap seorang pengusaha kaya raya sekaligus pembalap yang gila kecepatan dan kekuasaan.

programme.title: Detective K: Virtuous Widow
programme.desc: Detektif top Joseon menyelidiki serangkaian pembunuhan misterius yang berkaitan dengan konspirasi besar yang dapat menggemparkan seluruh negeri.

programme.title: Detective K: The Living Dead
programme.desc: Detektif K dan rekannya dibantu seorang wanita penderita amnesia guna menguak suatu kasus pembunuhan. Mereka melihat gigitan vampir pada jasad para korban dan menyadari bahwa wanita itu terkait dengan kematian mereka.

programme.title: Blood And Ties
programme.desc: Seorang jurnalis mencurigai ayahnya adalah seorang penculik kejam yang melarikan diri 15 tahun yang lalu.

programme.title: The Spy: Undercover Operation
programme.desc: Seorang agen yang sedang menyamar di luar negeri berusaha untuk menyeimbangkan pekerjaannya yang rumit dan istrinya yang tak tahu pekerjaannya.

programme.title: The Mayor
programme.desc: Byeon Jong-gu, walikota Seoul, mencalonkan diri sebagai presiden. Ia menggunakan segala cara untuk menyembunyikan rahasia-rahasia tergelapnya dari publik yang menyukainya.

programme.title: The Unjust
programme.desc: Saat tersangka sebuah kasus penting meninggal dalam tahanan, seorang pejabat tinggi kepolisian menciptakan pembunuhan berantai dengan menargetkan seorang pelaku untuk menenangkan masyarakat dan menutup kasus.

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: Selama pemerintahan kolonial Jepang, sekitar 400 warga Korea diwajibkan untuk bekerja di Pulau Hashima. Ketika rahasia kelam pulau itu terungkap, para pekerja Korea berencana untuk melarikan diri.

programme.title: Haemoo
programme.desc: Seorang awak kapal penangkap ikan mengambil risiko berbahaya untuk menyelundupkan sekelompok imigran gelap dari Tiongkok ke Korea. Saat seorang wanita muda jatuh ke laut, perjalanan mengerikan mereka dimulai.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: Untuk menjaga perdamaian, seorang detektif nan kejam dan timnya berencana untuk meringkus gangster yang paling ditakuti di Seoul.

programme.title: Sori: Voice From The Heart
programme.desc: Saat mencari putrinya yang hilang, seorang ayah menemukan sebuah satelit yang mampu mengingat suara dari seluruh dunia. Menggunakan suara putrinya sebagai suar, satelit itu membantunya melacak sang putri.

programme.title: Dark Figure Of Crime
programme.desc: Terinspirasi dari kisah nyata, film ini menceritakan tentang sebuah pertarungan psikologis nan sengit antara seorang detektif polisi dan seorang pembunuh yang mengaku telah melakukan beberapa pembunuhan.

programme.title: Will You Be There?
programme.desc: Keinginan terakhir seorang ahli bedah adalah bertemu almarhum kekasihnya. Ia menerima pil yang bisa membawanya kembali ke masa lalu untuk menyelamatkan kekasihnya. Di sana, ia bertemu dengan dirinya di saat muda.

programme.title: Bleak Night
programme.desc: Seorang ayah mencoba menerima kenyataan bahwa putranya tewas karena bunuh diri. Penemuan sebuah foto menuntunnya untuk menyelidiki teman-teman putranya demi mengetahui apa yang sebenarnya terjadi.

programme.title: Love Now
programme.desc: Hubungan yang saling berkaitan di antara dua pasang kekasih terjalin. Bagaimanakah mereka menjalani dan memperbaiki hubungan nan berbahaya dan rahasia ini?

programme.title: The Unjust
programme.desc: Saat tersangka sebuah kasus penting meninggal dalam tahanan, seorang pejabat tinggi kepolisian menciptakan pembunuhan berantai dengan menargetkan seorang pelaku untuk menenangkan masyarakat dan menutup kasus.

programme.title: The Target
programme.desc: Seorang dokter UGD bekerjasama dengan target pembunuhan dalam pengejaran selama 36 jam untuk menyelamatkan istrinya yang hamil. Mereka mengungkap korupsi yang telah lama menjangkiti departemen kepolisian.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: Seorang pesulap muda nan berbakat jatuh cinta pada seorang putri yang bertunangan dengan mantan gurunya. Hal ini menyebabkan sebuah pertikaian sengit antara dua pesulap nan hebat.

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Tepat sebelum berdirinya Dinasti Joseon, para utusan dari Tiongkok kehilangan Segel Kerajaan karena seekor paus. Sekelompok bandit berusaha untuk mengambilnya demi hadiah besar dan bertemu dengan sekelompok perompak.

programme.title: Blood And Ties
programme.desc: Seorang jurnalis mencurigai ayahnya adalah seorang penculik kejam yang melarikan diri 15 tahun yang lalu.

programme.title: Memorist
programme.desc: Dongbaek, yang memiliki kemampuan untuk membaca ingatan orang lain, dan Seon-mi, seorang profiler genius, bekerjasama untuk menyelidiki seorang pembunuh berantai yang dipanggil 'The Absolute Evil'.

programme.title: K-Pop Cultural Center
programme.desc: Kim Jong-min, Lee Sang-min dan Jang Do-yeon akan bergabung dengan sepuluh penggemar asing akan merasakan budaya Korea melalui musik K-pop.

programme.title: Mother's Touch
programme.desc: Seorang aktris veteran sekaligus koki handal di dapur, Kim Su-mi membagikan resepnya kepada tiga koki khusus untuk masakan asing dan mengajari mereka rahasia memasak makanan rumahan Korea.

programme.title: Memorist
programme.desc: Dongbaek, yang memiliki kemampuan untuk membaca ingatan orang lain, dan Seon-mi, seorang profiler genius, bekerjasama untuk menyelidiki seorang pembunuh berantai yang dipanggil 'The Absolute Evil'.

programme.title: M.U.S.T
programme.desc: Irene Kim dan teman-teman selebritasnya melakukan perjalanan romantis di sejumlah kota seperti Seoul, Bangkok dan Singapura, untuk menelusuri kota-kota tersebut dan menikmati budayanya.

programme.title: I Can See Your Voice
programme.desc: Bergabunglah bersama para pembawa acara dan tamu-tamu spesial dalam musim ke-tujuh ini untuk menebak siapa saja di antara para kontestan yang berbakat atau tuli nada dengan hanya melihat penampilan mereka!

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Escape, variety show No.1 di Korea, kembali untuk musim ke-tiga! Para pemain yang sama kembali menyelesaikan tantangan dengan berbagai petunjuk dalam tema yang berbeda. Namun, kali ini dalam skala yang lebih besar!

programme.title: Mother's Touch
programme.desc: Seorang aktris veteran sekaligus koki handal di dapur, Kim Su-mi membagikan resepnya kepada tiga koki khusus untuk masakan asing dan mengajari mereka rahasia memasak makanan rumahan Korea.

programme.title: 3 Meals A Day
programme.desc: TVN menghadirkan kembali serial klasik '3 Meals A Day'! Saksikan kembali musim pertama saat Taecyeon dan Lee Seo Jin akan memasak tiga makanan sehari saat menetap di beberapa desa pertanian di seluruh Korea.

programme.title: Touch Your Heart
programme.desc: Sebuah drama percintaan antara seorang aktris papan atas, yang karirnya hancur karena sebuah skandal, dengan seorang pengacara yang menyebalkan.

programme.title: Memorist
programme.desc: Dongbaek, yang memiliki kemampuan untuk membaca ingatan orang lain, dan Seon-mi, seorang profiler genius, bekerjasama untuk menyelidiki seorang pembunuh berantai yang dipanggil 'The Absolute Evil'.

programme.title: Memorist
programme.desc: Dongbaek, yang memiliki kemampuan untuk membaca ingatan orang lain, dan Seon-mi, seorang profiler genius, bekerjasama untuk menyelidiki seorang pembunuh berantai yang dipanggil 'The Absolute Evil'.

programme.title: M.U.S.T
programme.desc: Irene Kim dan teman-teman selebritasnya melakukan perjalanan romantis di sejumlah kota seperti Seoul, Bangkok dan Singapura, untuk menelusuri kota-kota tersebut dan menikmati budayanya.

programme.title: K-Pop Cultural Center
programme.desc: Kim Jong-min, Lee Sang-min dan Jang Do-yeon akan bergabung dengan sepuluh penggemar asing akan merasakan budaya Korea melalui musik K-pop.

programme.title: Touch Your Heart
programme.desc: Sebuah drama percintaan antara seorang aktris papan atas, yang karirnya hancur karena sebuah skandal, dengan seorang pengacara yang menyebalkan.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: Seorang aktris musikal yang memiliki kemampuan khusus untuk melihat 'waktu kematian' orang lain, termasuk miliknya, bertemu dengan seorang pria yang dapat menghentikan waktu kematiannya.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: Seorang aktris musikal yang memiliki kemampuan khusus untuk melihat 'waktu kematian' orang lain, termasuk miliknya, bertemu dengan seorang pria yang dapat menghentikan waktu kematiannya.

programme.title: M.U.S.T
programme.desc: Irene Kim dan teman-teman selebritasnya melakukan perjalanan romantis di sejumlah kota seperti Seoul, Bangkok dan Singapura, untuk menelusuri kota-kota tersebut dan menikmati budayanya.

programme.title: You Can Cook, Sam Kim
programme.desc: Chef terkenal Sam Kim akan mengajarkan cara memasak semua jenis masakan lezat, mulai dari pasta Italia, hidangan Spanyol, hingga hidangan pencuci mulut! Ikuti resepnya dan selamat memasak!

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Escape, variety show No.1 di Korea, kembali untuk musim ke-tiga! Para pemain yang sama kembali menyelesaikan tantangan dengan berbagai petunjuk dalam tema yang berbeda. Namun, kali ini dalam skala yang lebih besar!

programme.title: Memorist

programme.title: Touch Your Heart
programme.desc: Sebuah drama percintaan antara seorang aktris papan atas, yang karirnya hancur karena sebuah skandal, dengan seorang pengacara yang menyebalkan.

programme.title: Touch Your Heart
programme.desc: Sebuah drama percintaan antara seorang aktris papan atas, yang karirnya hancur karena sebuah skandal, dengan seorang pengacara yang menyebalkan.

programme.title: Friday Joy Package
programme.desc: Lee Seung-gi, Lee Seo-jin dan lainnya hadir di program baru dari PD Na, yakni Friday Joy Package! Program ini membahas berbagai topik dan terdiri dari enam buah segmen yang masing-masing berdurasi 10 menit.

programme.title: 60 Days In: Narcoland
programme.desc: Para peserta 60 Days In: Narcoland dan Sheriff Jamey Noel bertemu kembali untuk berbagi pengalaman dan pengetahuan yang mereka pelajari selama menjalani misi mereka.

programme.title: Critical Evidence
programme.desc: Para ahli menyelidiki kasus Sameena yang jasadnya digali dari sebuah kebun di Leicester. Bukti-bukti menunjukkan bahwa Roger dan David Cooper lah yang membunuhnya.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters S1: Investigation
programme.desc: Grant Wilson memberikan tayangan eksklusif pada pemirsa tentang bagaimana tim melakukan segala cara untuk mencari aktivitas paranormal sambil tetap mengedepankan penjelasan logis.

programme.title: The Haunting Of
programme.desc: Aktris Morgan Fairchild berusaha mencari jawaban dari serangkaian kejadian yang menghantuinya, baik berupa hal nyata ataupun supranatural yang membuatnya pergi dari rumah mantan suaminya 40 tahun yang lalu.

programme.title: Psychic Kids
programme.desc: Sepuluh tahun yang lalu, 'Psychic Kids' menampilkan perjalanan anak-anak yang belajar mengendalikan kemampuan luar biasa mereka. Kini, anak-anak tersebut telah dewasa dan siap membantu generasi berikutnya.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: Kala seorang detektif dibunuh secara keji, para detektif lainnya menemukan bahwa ia mungkin bukan korban pertama si pembunuh.

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: Steve Dingle, imigran asal Filipina yang tinggal di Hawaii, kembali ke kampung halaman dan menikahi Cathy. Namun, berbagai tekanan dalam pernikahan mereka memicu terjadinya perselingkuhan, kekerasan, dan pembunuhan.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: Kala seorang detektif dibunuh secara keji, para detektif lainnya menemukan bahwa ia mungkin bukan korban pertama si pembunuh.

programme.title: Who Killed Tupac?
programme.desc: Benjamin Crump dan tim ahlinya menganalisis keaslian sebuah surat pengakuan misterius yang baru saja terungkap. Muncul bukti baru yang dapat membuka kasus ini secara lebih luas.

programme.title: Born To Kill?
programme.desc: Levi Bellfield yang dijuluki 'Bus Stop Killer' mengincar wanita-wanita yang menggunakan transportasi umum di London dan area sekitarnya. Ia telah membunuh tiga wanita, tapi korbannya diduga berjumlah lebih dari itu.

programme.title: Mark Of A Killer
programme.desc: Di New Jersey empat mayat ditemukan terpotong, dibungkus, dan dibuang di tong sampah pinggir jalan. Sang pembunuh memburu korbannya secara terang-terangan di bar, tapi tak ada yang menduga ia bekerja sebagai perawat.

programme.title: Smart Justice: Jayme Closs Case
programme.desc: Jayme Closs yang berusia 30 tahun diculik dari rumahnya di Wisconsin, setelah menyaksikan kedua orangtuanya dibunuh di depan matanya. Jayme berhasil melarikan diri, mencari bantuan, dan akhirnya diselamatkan.

programme.title: Hero Ink
programme.desc: Chris dan David membuat tato untuk mengingat kembali perjuangan hidup dan mati saat senapan yang dibawa oleh seorang tersangka hampir merenggut nyawa Chris.

programme.title: Three Days To Live
programme.desc: Alicia Kozakiewicz berusia 13 tahun saat menghilang dari rumahnya di pinggiran kota Pennsylvania. Kekhawatiran muncul setelah rencana jahat seorang predator anak terungkap dari komputer milik keluarga Alicia.

programme.title: Three Days To Live
programme.desc: Kepolisian bekerja keras demi menemukan Brenna Machus yang berusia 20 tahun setelah penculikan atas dirinya dan pembunuhan sadis rekan kerjanya mengejutkan wilayah Dearborn.

programme.title: Live PD: Patrol
programme.desc: Agen-agen penegak hukum menangani sejumlah kasus yang melibatkan kasus tabrak lari di Florida, mengemudi di bawah pengaruh narkoba di Arizona, dan suatu mobil yang menabrak sebuah rumah di Carolina Selatan.

programme.title: Live PD: Patrol
programme.desc: Agen-agen penegak hukum menangani sejumlah kasus yang melibatkan penolakan penangkapan di Carolina Selatan, penggerebekan narkoba di Arizona dan pengejaran yang sia-sia di Utah.

programme.title: America's Top Dog
programme.desc: Kali ini, dua anjing rumahan menghadapi anjing profesional. Akankah sang juara berpengalaman menang, atau seorang petinju dan seekor anjing pitbul memiliki kesempatan untuk jadi pemenang?

programme.title: Live PD...: PD Cam
programme.desc: Seorang petugas ditembak saat membersihkan rumah. Polisi mengejar seekor kuda poni yang melarikan diri di pinggiran kota Texas, dan seorang petugas K9 terluka oleh tersangka yang kabur.

programme.title: Live PD...: PD Cam
programme.desc: Seorang tersangka pengutil menabrakkan mobil SUV miliknya demi menghindari polisi. Terjadi perseteruan hebat dengan tersangka yang menggunakan pisau, dan kendaraan polisi Florida terbakar di jalan raya.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: Pada 7 November 2014, Ina Clare Richardson yang berusia 69 tahun ditemukan terbunuh secara mengenaskan di sebuah taman di Clarkston, Washington. Tanpa adanya saksi, para detektif menyelidiki kamera pengawas.

programme.title: 60 Days In
programme.desc: Saat Sheriff yang baru terpilih, Jonathan W Horton, menjabat dan mendapati penjara yang ia pimpin sangat membutuhkan reformasi, ia meminta bantuan tujuh warga sipil tak berdosa untuk menyamar sebagai tahanan.

programme.title: Gotti: Godfather & Son
programme.desc: Ketika tumbuh besar di Howard Beach, New York, dan menimba ilmu di Akademi Militer New York, John mengetahui tentang bertambah kuatnya kekuasaan sang ayah di dunia kejahatan terorganisasi.

programme.title: Live PD...: Women
programme.desc: Para polisi wanita menangani kasus mengendara sambil mabuk di Carolina Utara, penangkapan seorang buronan di Texas dan kekerasan dalam rumah tangga di Arizona.

programme.title: Live PD...: Women
programme.desc: Para polisi wanita melakukan penyelidikan terkait kasus kebakaran yang terjadi di Carolina Utara, menangani aksi mabuk-mabukan di tempat umum di California dan kekerasan dalam rumah tangga yang terjadi di Arizona.

programme.desc: Para polisi wanita melakukan penyelidikan terkait kasus kebakaran yang terjadi di Carolina Utara, menangani aksi mabuk-mabukan di tempat umum di California dan kekerasan dalam rumah tangga yang terjadi di Arizona.

programme.title: Live PD: Patrol
programme.desc: Agen-agen penegak hukum menangani sejumlah kasus yang melibatkan kasus tabrak lari di Florida, mengemudi di bawah pengaruh narkoba di Arizona, dan suatu mobil yang menabrak sebuah rumah di Carolina Selatan.

programme.title: Live PD: Patrol
programme.desc: Agen-agen penegak hukum menangani sejumlah kasus yang melibatkan penolakan penangkapan di Carolina Selatan, penggerebekan narkoba di Arizona dan pengejaran yang sia-sia di Utah.

programme.title: America's Top Dog
programme.desc: Kali ini, dua anjing rumahan menghadapi anjing profesional. Akankah sang juara berpengalaman menang, atau seorang petinju dan seekor anjing pitbul memiliki kesempatan untuk jadi pemenang?

programme.title: Live PD...: PD Cam
programme.desc: Seorang petugas ditembak saat membersihkan rumah. Polisi mengejar seekor kuda poni yang melarikan diri di pinggiran kota Texas, dan seorang petugas K9 terluka oleh tersangka yang kabur.

programme.title: Live PD...: PD Cam
programme.desc: Seorang tersangka pengutil menabrakkan mobil SUV miliknya demi menghindari polisi. Terjadi perseteruan hebat dengan tersangka yang menggunakan pisau, dan kendaraan polisi Florida terbakar di jalan raya.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: Pada 7 November 2014, Ina Clare Richardson yang berusia 69 tahun ditemukan terbunuh secara mengenaskan di sebuah taman di Clarkston, Washington. Tanpa adanya saksi, para detektif menyelidiki kamera pengawas.

programme.title: 60 Days In
programme.desc: Saat Sheriff yang baru terpilih, Jonathan W Horton, menjabat dan mendapati penjara yang ia pimpin sangat membutuhkan reformasi, ia meminta bantuan tujuh warga sipil tak berdosa untuk menyamar sebagai tahanan.

programme.title: Gotti: Godfather & Son
programme.desc: Ketika tumbuh besar di Howard Beach, New York, dan menimba ilmu di Akademi Militer New York, John mengetahui tentang bertambah kuatnya kekuasaan sang ayah di dunia kejahatan terorganisasi.

programme.title: Live PD...: Women
programme.desc: Para polisi wanita menangani kasus mengendara sambil mabuk di Carolina Utara, penangkapan seorang buronan di Texas dan kekerasan dalam rumah tangga di Arizona.

programme.title: Live PD...: Women
programme.desc: Para polisi wanita melakukan penyelidikan terkait kasus kebakaran yang terjadi di Carolina Utara, menangani aksi mabuk-mabukan di tempat umum di California dan kekerasan dalam rumah tangga yang terjadi di Arizona.

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: John dan Evie Watson berhasil mengatasi perbedaan usia dan juga budaya agar dapat bersama. Namun, 40 tahun kemudian, saat amarah memuncak dan sejumlah rahasia terungkap, salah satu dari mereka menghilang.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars
programme.desc: Pada 31 Januari 2011, Aaron yang berusia 14 tahun menembak tetangganya Alana, di rumahnya di Harlem, Georgia. Ia dihukum seumur hidup tanpa pembebasan bersyarat, saat usianya 21 tahun ia mengajukan banding.

programme.title: Critical Evidence
programme.desc: Lynne yang mengikuti wawancara pekerjaan ditemukan meninggal tak lama kemudian. Sebuah bekas gigitan di dagu korban membantu ahli forensik menangkap pembunuhnya yang berpura-pura menjadi pilot maskapai penerbangan.

programme.title: Leah R.: Scientology
programme.desc: Leah berbincang dengan sejumlah mantan pengikut ajaran Scientology yang menceritakan bahwa mereka harus memberikan uang dengan nominal besar untuk gereja yang membuat mereka bangkrut dan terpuruk.

programme.title: Cults And Extreme Belief
programme.desc: Tumbuh besar di dalam kelompok U.N.O.I, Elijah Muhammad dipaksa menjadi pekerja anak, mendapat penyiksaan fisik dan juga menjalani kehidupan nan memprihatinkan. Kini, ia berusaha untuk mencari keadilan.

programme.title: Escaping Polygamy
programme.desc: MaryAnn, seorang anggota FLDS yang melanggar aturan, menghubungi Jessica dan Amanda tentang meninggalkan kelompok poligami. Saat keluarganya mengetahui rencana pelariannya, para gadis harus mengambil tindakan cepat.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: Para detektif mengungkap sebuah motif sepele usai seseorang menembak seorang pria tunawisma di jalanan area Mobile, Alabama.

programme.title: Fatal Vows

programme.title: Trigger Happy

programme.title: Road FC 2018
